Name: furnace production, pellets, with silo, 300kW | furnace, pellets, with silo, 300kW | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners
Description: Boiler of modern technology available on European and Swiss market, with combustion chamber in refractory bricks, designed for an optimal combustion process (cyclone integrated). The model of reference is a pellet boiler, mod.KWB Powerfire 300 kW. Represent the typical boiler for providing heat for local heating networks, commercial premises and multi-storey housing.;Source of image: http://www.kwb.at/at/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=194&Itemid=170
